messages.command.config.configure.description:
&fConfigure a config within the game by using a gui.
&8Note:&f This wil also give hints, tips and usage examples in the itemlore
messages.command.relation.enemy.fail: &c&lFailed&f to set {faction} to your enemies. Caused by {error}
messages.territory.entered.subtitle: {relation}{territory}
messages.rank.guest.description: This rank has everyone whom is not in your faction. Can be used as an example to allow button presses by anyone, if you have a casino in your faction
messages.command.admin.disband.description: &fDelete a faction. &6&lWarning:&f This cannot be undone. If you want to delete your own faction, please use &7/f delete
messages.command.plugin.standby.description: &fPut the plugin manually in standby. &7Use cases:&f You have a server and don't want to shut down for changes. Put if in standby to protect the claimed chunks and prevent errors with the data
messages.faction.kick.success: &c&lSorry!&f But you got kicked out of &e{faction_display}
messages.command.relation.accept.description: &fAccept a relation with a faction for being allies
messages.command.help.description: &fGet a list of all first layer commands
messages.command.zones.unclaimable.description: &fClaim a unclaimable zone, where nobody can claim this chunk. That's all. It allows everything, but claiming. Perfect for using worldguard to set flags
messages.command.relation.status.changed: &fYour status with {faction} changed. You are now {status}
messages.command.zones.warzone.description: &fClaim a warzone, where nobody can place blocks, break blocks, claim this chunk but hit each others
messages.command.plugin.disable.description: &fDisable the plugin, so you can remove it without stoping the server
messages.command.relation.remove.description: &fSet a faction back to being neutral
messages.command.admin.description: &fThis command allows access to command that should be used to moderate your server. &8Note: &fThis can also be used to delete the entire faction data
messages.command.plugin.standby.success: &a&lSuccessfully&f put the plugin in &l&eStandby&f. Use &7/rl&f to disable standby
messages.command.relation.remove.fail: &c&lFailed&f to set {faction} to be hostile towards you. Caused by {error}
messages.command.admin.hardreset.description: &6&lWarning: &fThis will remove all your data. Removes all /Data/ files and resets your configs
messages.rank.admin.description: The &6admin&8 is like a moderator. He should be able to help people in your faction
messages.command.relation.accept.success: &a&fSuccessfully&f accepted the invitation of &e{faction}&f. You are now allies. Change their permissions using the rank system
messages.command.relation.reject.success: &a&lSuccessfully&c rejected&f the invitation of &e{faction}&f to be allies
messages.command.config.backup.description: &fManage what data gets restored from the backup files
messages.command.config.save.description: &fSave the config data. &8Note: &fThis will maybe save some files to the backup
messages.command.config.reload.description: &fReload the configs. &8Note: &fThis will &f&l&nnot&f save the configs before reloading
messages.command.relation.remove.success: &a&lSuccessfully&f set {faction} to be hostile towards you
messages.command.relation.ally.fail: &c&lFailed&f to set {faction} to your allies. Caused by {error}
messages.command.relation.enemy.description: &fSet a faction to your &cenemies&f. Set their permissions with the rank
messages.territory.entered.title: {relation}{territory}
messages.rank.owner.description: The &6owner&8 has created this faction. He has all rights, even if you remove them
messages.command.faction.claim.one.description: &fProtect a chunk from being grief by other factions
messages.command.zones.description: &fCreate & manage unclaimable neutral zones for players
messages.command.admin.hardreset.success: &a&lSuccessfully&f removed all your data. Please use &8/rl&f to make sure everything loaded correctly
messages.rank.member.description: The &6member&8 is automatically everyone which is in your faction for more than 3 days
messages.command.faction.delete.description: &fDelete a faction if you are the owner of it
messages.command.zones.safezone.description: &fClaim a safezone, where nobody can place blocks, break blocks, hit each other and claim this chunk
messages.command.admin.hardreset.confirm_player: &6&lWarning: &fYou are about to delete your data. &fPlease confirm intention to protect you to prevent you from inadvertently deleting your data. Use &8/f admin reset confirm &f if you want to use it
messages.command.relation.ally.description: &fSet a faction to your allies. Set their permissions with the rank
messages.gui.extension.download.title: &eAvailable extensions
messages.gui.config.backup.title: &e&lImprovedFaction &econfig backup
messages.command.relation.ally.invitation: &e{faction}&f wants to be allied with you. You want to accept it? Use &8/f relation accept {inviter}&f or &8/f relation reject {inviter}
messages.command.plugin.disable.success: &a&lSuccessfully&f disabled the plugin. &8Note:&7 This should only be used if you want to remove the plugin &7&n&lnot&7 reload it
messages.command.config.backup.remove.description: &fThis will remove all loaded backup files. &6&lWarning:&f This cannot be undone
messages.rank.newmember.description: The &6new member&8 is like a member, but he just joined. This rank exists, because else anyone could join a public faction to raid them. So don't give them access to all your valuables
messages.command.config.save.backup: &f&6&lWarning:&f looks like something went wrong while saving {config}. Please check &7console&f / &7reload&f. When done, use &7/f config backup
messages.message.plugin-standby: &fThe plugin has put itself in standby mode. &f&nAll&f commands are now disabled. &f&nOnly&f simple claim protection is running. &f&nCheck the console for more details

author: Tobero
credits: Thanks for this amazing support from everyone who uses this plugin
